name: FOUR SEASONS: SUMMER by Matteo Mauro Studio

metadata.description:
M. Mauro (b.1992), Four Seasons

Includes a 90x90x0.3 cm (35.4x35.4x0.1in) physical artwork realized via UV light pigments sublimation on certified composite aluminum, signed in metallic Ink and numbered, with stamped certificate of authenticity attached, mounted on anodised aluminum frame Made in Germany.

Includes 1x Airdrop of one artwork Ed of 10. Includes 1x entry to 1/1 drawing.
metadata.name: IT IS SUMMER BUT MY DREAMS ARE COLD #1/4
